atrociously adverb
(VERY BADLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very bad or unpleasant: The children have been behaving absolutely atrociously. The pastry was atrociously soggy.
More examplesFewer examplesHe writes atrociously.It's atrociously cold outside.He was performing the atrociously difficult Second Piano Concerto.
